VinhChilling

Why does everybody start to care about the matrix so much lately?

crypto.name: R esurre C tion 4
crypto.desc:
FlaggnGoose

RC4 really can't be that bad. See, I am sampling a new key at each iteration, and I am even using XOR, i.e. one-time pad (right?), to exchange two values! Maybe we should use RC4 again!

crypto.name: Snoopy
crypto.desc:
dm

This looks like an un-ruh-hack-able nut, my friends. But my nose says: snoop sniff out the way!

crypto.name: choose the param
crypto.desc:
bronson113

I wounder why we need to specify parameter length in the spec...

crypto.name: half big rsa
crypto.desc:
FlaggnGoose

Prime numbers are the best numbers. So, you should let me use it for my modulus!

crypto.name: schnore
crypto.desc:
enigcryptist

I can't seem to adapt to my new sleep schedule, too tired to interact right now...

crypto.name: shamir for dummies
crypto.desc:
FlaggnGoose

I need to use Shamir secret sharing scheme (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shamir%27s_secret_sharing), but my friend only knows how to do additions. Can you help me and my friend?

misc.name: B01lersParlay
misc.desc:
vinhchilling

Shazly just got hired to work on a new promising project for B01lersParlay, an organization specialized in novel wealth creation tactics. He was given a token to access the project on GitLab SAAS, but he keeps complaining he can’t even clone the project nor access the URL given. The CEO, Captain Baccarat, was apparently disappointed. Can you help Shazly uncovered the secret behind this strange scammy organization?

misc.name: TeXnically...
misc.desc:
FlaggnGoose, VinhChilling

Technically, you can program with LaTeX! I made a program that hides the flag =D

misc.name: awpcode
misc.desc:
CygnusX

The awp from cs can shoot through walls!

misc.name: basketball scholar
misc.desc:
FlaggnGoose

I saw my classmate doing homework in the stadium instead of watching the basketball game (what a nerd!). I texted him and asked if he could share his answers. Instead of texting them to me, he pulled a piece of paper, wrote answers on it, then crumpled and tried to tossed it to me across the court. It (obviously) was a bad idea; it almost hit our mascot Purdue Pete! (Picture source: https://www.wthr.com/article/news/local/purdue-pete-named-creepiest-mascot-in-america/531-5e9ce5b9-5fbc-48db-b927-332a8746ec8a)

misc.name: chest mix
misc.desc:
colbyjack

Here's a minecraft world, the flag is on a piece of paper in the the chest by spawn, it's hard to miss. Version 1.20

misc.name: cppjail
misc.desc:
pawnlord

I've come to the conclusion that any programmer that would prefer the project to be in C++ over C is likely a programmer that I really would prefer to piss off, so that he doesn't come and screw up any project I'm involved with. Flag length is 53.

Can you snatch victory from the jaws of defeat?

Ever needed to buy something that cost an ARM and a leg? Well, now you can!

pwn.name: seeing red
pwn.desc:
CaptainNapkins

Didn't sleep for three nights while staring at ticketmaster waiting to get out of the Eras queue and I get sick on the day of, smh. Anyway, if you can find my ticket you can go!

pwn.name: shall we play a game

CaptainNapkins

Shall we play a game?

rev.name: Annnnnnny Second Now
rev.desc:
Bilbin

My teacher tried telling me that my code will take around 40 billion years to run. Hah! Shows what he knows. I'm sure it'll finish any second now...

rev.name: To Link or Not to Link
rev.desc:
Bilbin

I was on the bus the other day, and an old man had a heart attack, dropping to the ground. I rushed over to him, about to call 911. He said "It's over for me, son, but I do have one final request." He reached into his pocket and handed me a flash drive, and with his dying breath, said "Give my wife this message." I nodded my head and somberly walked away. To be honest, I had no intentions of actually doing this, but I guess you can. What did he want to tell her?

rev.name: b01lers bracket
rev.desc:
Athryx

How good are your bracketology skills?

rev.name: catch me if you can
rev.desc:
bronson113

I give you this flag generator, but it's too slow. You need to speed up to catch me =D

rev.name: mixtape
rev.desc:
Athryx

This bytecode vm is really mixing me up, can you figure out whats going on? This challenge uses the same binary as mixtpeailbc.

web.name: 3 city elves writeups
web.desc:
VinhChilling

I'm competing in a CTF so I don't have time to make my 3-city-elves challenge. How about you guys help me with the CTF I'm in by submitting some writeups? I would really appreciate it! I only need some kind of medical hardware hacking, like insulin pump hacking. Supply chain is also acceptable. Don't try to do anything silly, the writeup submission comes with a next-gen WAF. We need your help to beat Contraband Manchester United and Sigma Pony!

Ads Ads Ads! Cheap too! You want an Ad on our site? Just let us know!

web.name: b01lers casino
web.desc:

Do you know you just need to win 40 times in a row to become the richest person in the world? That's it! Screw real estates, stocks, cryptos, NVIDIA hypes, and behold the truest method of wealth generation! Unbiased, all justice!
